Ogre::OcclusionBoundingBox

Ogre::OcclusionBoundingBox Class Reference

#include <OgreOcclusionBoundingBox.h>

List of all members.

Detailed Description

Allows the rendering of an opaque bounding box.

Remarks:
This class builds a opaque renderable from a given aabb. A pointer to this class can be added to a render queue to display the bounding box of an object.
